summary: Premium luxury eCommerce website for BONITARA – Inspired By Elegance. Features: Home page with hero, featured categories, best sellers, about section, reviews, newsletter; 4 main categories (Soap Making, Candle Making, Resin Art, Fragrance) each with 25+ products with full product details, pricing, SKU, stock, wishlist, related products; Wholesale page with inquiry form; FAQ, Shipping Policy, Terms & Conditions, Return & Refund Policy, Contact Us pages; cart, checkout, user accounts, order tracking, inventory management, admin dashboard, blog section; Razorpay/Stripe/UPI integration; luxury UI with ivory/beige/soft gold/charcoal palette, animations, hover effects, elegant typography; SEO optimized; email-enabled features (newsletter, contact form, wholesale inquiry form, order emails).
architectural_notes: Brand name: BONITARA – Inspired By Elegance
Color palette: ivory, beige, soft gold, charcoal
India-based business; GST/PAN required for wholesale; pricing in INR (₹)
Email must be enabled on account for newsletter, contact form, wholesale inquiry, and order emails

Product visualization/detail page has layout alignment issues

existing_features.title: Build a Home page with a full-width hero section, featured categories section (Soap Making, Candle Making, Resin Art, Fragrance), best sellers product grid, about/brand story section, customer reviews carousel, and newsletter signup section.
Create 4 product category pages — Soap Making, Candle Making, Resin Art, and Fragrance — each displaying 25+ products with filtering and sorting options.
Build individual product detail pages showing full product info: name, description, price, SKU, stock status, image gallery, related products, and Add to Cart / Wishlist controls.
Implement a shopping cart with item management (add, remove, update quantity), subtotal calculation, and proceed to checkout flow.
Build a checkout page with shipping address form, order summary, and payment method selection supporting Razorpay, Stripe, and UPI placeholder options.
Implement user account system with registration, login, profile management, order history, and order tracking.
Build a Wholesale page with bulk pricing tiers, MOQ (minimum order quantity) information, private label details, GST information, and an email-enabled inquiry form.
Create static informational pages: FAQ, Shipping Policy, Terms & Conditions, Return & Refund Policy, and Contact Us with a functional contact form.
Build an Admin Dashboard allowing management of products (add/edit/delete), inventory levels, order management with status updates, and viewing wholesale and contact inquiries.
Build a Blog section with a listing page and individual blog post detail pages.

Apply a luxury visual theme across all pages using an ivory/beige/soft gold/charcoal color palette, elegant serif typography for headings, smooth animations, hover effects on interactive elements, and fully mobile-responsive layouts.
Generate and render a luxury brand hero background image and a BONITARA logo as static assets used throughout the site.

Add hardcoded admin credentials to the backend and display them clearly on the Admin Dashboard login screen. The admin username should be 'admin' and a secure default password (e.g., 'Bonitara@2024') should be set and checked in the Motoko actor's adminCheck logic. Display the credentials (ID and password) visibly on the AdminDashboardPage for easy reference during development.

Fix the footer menu/navigation link text color so that all footer links and menu items are clearly visible against the footer background. Ensure text color uses a legible contrast color (e.g., ivory or soft gold) consistent with the BONITARA luxury theme.

When a user clicks on a product from the suggestions or related products section on the ProductDetailPage, the page must automatically scroll to the top before rendering the new product's details. Implement smooth scroll-to-top behavior triggered on product navigation from any suggestion or related product click.

Audit and improve the responsive layout and animation quality across all pages of the BONITARA site. Ensure every page renders correctly on mobile (320px+), tablet (768px+), and desktop (1280px+) breakpoints. Add or refine smooth CSS/Tailwind transitions and animations for interactive elements such as buttons, cards, modals, dropdowns, and navigation menus. Ensure no layout overflow, broken grids, or misaligned elements exist on small screens.

Fix the ProductDetailPage so that clicking on any product (from category pages, home page best sellers, related products, or any other listing) correctly loads and displays the actual selected product's details — not always the first product (Rose Petal Soap). The product to display must be determined by the product ID passed via the URL/routing parameter, and the page must fetch/look up that specific product from the products data by its ID.

Implement a global scroll-to-top behavior so that every time the user clicks any navigation link, menu item, product card, footer link, category link, or any in-app anchor that triggers a route change, the page automatically scrolls to the top (position 0,0) before rendering the new page content.

Fix the mobile hamburger/menu icon in the Header component so that clicking it on the Home Screen (and all pages) correctly toggles open the mobile navigation menu. The mobile menu state must update on click, the menu drawer/panel must become visible, and all navigation links within the menu must be accessible and functional.

Fix the layout alignment issues on the ProductDetailPage (product visualization/detail page). Ensure all sections — product image gallery, product title, price, SKU, stock status, quantity selector, Add to Cart/Wishlist buttons, product description/specs tabs, and related products grid — are correctly aligned, properly spaced, and display without overflow, misalignment, or broken layout on mobile (320px+), tablet (768px+), and desktop (1280px+) breakpoints.

Add a product review and rating feature to the ProductDetailPage. Each product detail page must include: (1) a star rating selector (1–5 stars) allowing customers to submit a rating, (2) a text review form with a name field and review body, (3) a 'Submit Review' button that saves the review (stored in backend or local state), (4) a reviews list displayed below the product description/specs tabs showing each review's author name, star rating, date, and review text, and (5) an average star rating displayed on the ProductCard component alongside the existing rating display.

Replace the existing BONITARA logo used in the Header component and any other locations across the site (footer brand mark, any page headers) with the user's final uploaded logo image (bonitara-logo-final.png). The logo must be stored as a static asset at frontend/public/assets/generated/bonitara-logo-final.png and rendered using an tag referencing that path. Remove or replace any previously generated logo asset references.

Fix the 'Contact Us' link in the Footer component so that clicking it correctly navigates to the Contact Us page AND triggers a scroll to the top of the page (position 0, 0). Currently clicking 'Contact Us' in the footer menu does not scroll to the top. The fix must ensure the scroll-to-top behavior fires on this navigation action, consistent with the global scroll-to-top behavior already implemented for other links.

Fix the Admin Dashboard login so that entering the hardcoded credentials (username: 'admin', password: 'Bonitara@2024') successfully authenticates and grants access to the dashboard tabs. Ensure the Motoko adminCheck function correctly validates these credentials, and the AdminDashboardPage login form correctly calls that function, handles the response, and transitions to the authenticated dashboard view on success. Display the credentials visibly on the login screen for development reference.

Fix the home page layout alignment issues. Restore all HomePage sections — hero banner, featured categories, best sellers product grid, why-us feature cards, testimonial carousel, and newsletter section — to be correctly aligned, properly spaced, and free of overflow or broken grids on mobile (320px+), tablet (768px+), and desktop (1280px+) breakpoints.

Fix all footer menu and navigation link text colors in the Footer component so they are clearly legible as white/ivory against the dark footer background. All footer links — Quick Links, Category Links, Policy Links, Contact links, and social icons — must use white or ivory color (e.g., text-white, text-ivory, or text-gold-300 as defined in the Tailwind config) and must never appear black or invisible. Hover states must also remain visible and consistent with the luxury theme.

Fix the login and registration flow so that users can successfully register new accounts and log in using existing credentials. The authentication state must persist correctly, and authenticated users must be redirected to their profile/account page after successful login. Unauthenticated users must be redirected to the login prompt when accessing protected pages (Profile, OrderHistory).

Fix all policy page routes so that the FAQ, Shipping Policy, Terms & Conditions, and Return & Refund Policy pages navigate to and render their correct content pages. Currently some policy links open the Home page instead of the intended policy page. Audit the hash-based routing in App.tsx and ensure each policy route maps to its correct page component (FAQPage, ShippingPolicyPage, TermsPage, ReturnPolicyPage).

Remove the Categories navigation column entirely from the Footer component. The footer currently contains a 'Categories' section with links to the four product categories (Soap Making, Candle Making, Resin Art, Fragrance). This entire column must be removed. The remaining footer columns (Quick Links, Policies, Contact) must reflow gracefully to fill the layout without leaving empty space.

Fix the product review submission on ProductDetailPage so that clicking 'Submit Review' correctly saves the review to the backend and immediately displays it in the reviews list. The ReviewForm component must invoke the useSubmitReview mutation hook successfully, the backend submitReview Motoko function must accept and persist the review, and the ReviewsList component must reflect the newly submitted review after cache invalidation.

Add a manual email/password login and registration system to the site. The login page must present two options: (1) Manual login with email and password fields and a 'Login' button, and (2) Internet Identity (existing). The registration page must present two options: (1) Manual registration with name, email, password, and confirm password fields and a 'Register' button, and (2) Internet Identity. Both pages must be clearly laid out so regular users and the admin can easily understand and use them. The admin can use username 'admin' and password 'Bonitara@2024' via the manual login path. Store registered user credentials in the Motoko backend and validate login against stored records.

Every page — Home, Category, ProductDetail, Cart, Checkout, Profile, OrderHistory, Blog, Wholesale, FAQ, ShippingPolicy, Terms, ReturnPolicy, ContactUs, and AdminDashboard — must render correctly and without overflow, broken grids, or misaligned elements on mobile (320px+), tablet (768px+), and desktop (1280px+) breakpoints. All interactive elements (buttons, cards, modals, dropdowns, forms, navigation menus) must have touch-friendly tap targets (minimum 44px). Images must resize correctly without distortion. Font sizes must scale appropriately across breakpoints. The hamburger mobile menu must open and close correctly. Modals and overlays must display properly on small screens.
